message: Many good programmers made tunnel services, like localtunnel.me. ngrok has 1 advantage still missing from the others: SSL works!
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: I'd be interested in how SSL works. I know the guys behind http://readme.localtest.me/ and at first they got a real certificate but then later CA didn't like what they were doing because the private key wasn't secure, and they thought any other authority will think the same and gave up on it.
I heard this story as well. I don't know if ngrok solved the SSL problem or just the CA didn't revoke certifcate yet :)
You know that with Gulp they have a module that does this for you when you start your local server?
